body: Can you please add your redacted config too?
5314.e59acd16c, the latest on the OS X, works and does not exhibit this behavior.

I don't think that really matters since I can't see any change between those 2 commits that could have caused this. It's just the style of path handling that's different in OSX & Windows that's causing this issue.

Paging @ncw
Just to verify the root cause, please try with this build too: https://beta.rclone.org/v1.55.0-beta.5274.ff6868900/

Alright, that narrows it down to the refactoring done by @ncw recently.

Thanks for checking.

I bisected this problem to 8a46dd1b5761b375c72382bb7a01de6ae8ad72a8 - I must have messed up the windows path parsing somehow.

Comparing the intialisatin of the local backed I can see that the old code translated `\` to `/` which the new code isn't.

new initialisation

    2021/03/22 11:43:04 DEBUG : NewFs name="local" root="Z:\\go\\src\\github.com\\rclone\\rclone\\README.md"

old initialisation

    2021/03/22 11:44:39 DEBUG : NewFs name="local" root="Z:/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/README.md"

I've attempted to fix this here, can you give it a go?

[v1.55.0-beta.5327.ec2037afe.fix-5143-windows-path](https://beta.rclone.org/branch/fix-5143-windows-path/v1.55.0-beta.5327.ec2037afe.fix-5143-windows-path/) on branch [fix-5143-windows-path](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/tree/fix-5143-windows-path) (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

issue.title: Rclone v1.55 release

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
As an experiment I'm creating a release issue.

The release is planned for 31st March 20201 (that is the date in the milestone). That is just over a week away so I'd like not to merge features which might break too much stuff from now on.

I've been merging my backlog in an attempt to hit that date. I have two small features to merge - a configuration for the backend cache and a JSON config string for the rc.

Is there anything that you @rclone/rclone developers would like to see in the release too? Bear in mind that there will be another release along soon in 6-8 weeks!

- [x] Issue template needs merging: #5096
- [x] This fix needs merging #5143
- [x] And so does this one #5139

body: I've merged this to master now which means it will be in [the latest beta](https://beta.rclone.org) in 15-30 mins and released in v1.55
